titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to Lieutenant-Colonel John Macdonald, Envoy to the Court of Persia

mods.abstract: Stannus asks Macdonald to initiate an appeal against a monetary award made in the court of the qadee (cadi) at Bushire against Arrathoon Malcolm, linguist of the Residency. Stannus felt that the decision had not been impartial, and he recites the particulars of the case. He also raises the question of legal protection for persons employed in the service of the British Government.
